comment.author: 65142822@N07
comment._content: She looks like she's 25 going on 40 - but then a lot of them do.  Wonder how many of them actually made it to the ripe old age of 40?

comment.author: 53155717@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/65142822@N07] Life was hard back then, especially for poor people which a lot of these prisoners would be. That is probably why after the age of 19 they start looking rapidly aged.
